name: 5beta-cholestane-3alpha,7alpha-diol,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (12alpha-hydroxylating)
definition: 3alpha,7alpha-Dihydroxy-5beta-cholestane + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 3alpha,7alpha,12alpha-Trihydroxy-5beta-cholestane + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
